matrix.vui
Class DragAndDrop

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.vui.DragAndDrop
public class DragAndDrop
extends java.lang.Object

This class coordinates the mouse events involved in a drag and drop session. The reason this class is necessary is because when the mouse starts dragging in one Component and then moves over a different Component, the first Component is the one that gets all the mouse messages. That first Component is the DragAndDropSource, and the second is the DragAndDropTarget. The job of this class is to shuttle the mouse events from the source to the target, translating the mouse events on the way.
